titleStmt.title: The copie of a pistel or letter sent to Gilbard Potter in the tyme when he was in prison for speakinge on our most true quenes part the Lady Mary before he had his eares cut of. The. xiii of Julye.
titleStmt.author: Poor Pratte.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: [Imprynted at London in Temstrete ouer agaynste the stiliardes, at the signe of the dobbel hood :
publicationStmt.date: Anno. M.D.Liii. the firste of August [1553]

notesStmt.note: The name of the author, Poore Pratte, is a pseudonym--Cf. STC.
Publisher's name and place of publication from colophon. Printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
